channel.title: Adding a different crown P 2
channel.description: Ok so I'd like to thank the people who helped me figure out how to customize my mod and admin crowns. But now I've got another problem, It shows the Admin crown for people with player rights of 2 AND 3. How do I make it so that it only shows up for someone with player rights of 2. And I'd like to know how to add another crown for people with player rights of 3.

item.title: Adding a different crown P 2
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

r0ckstar96:

Ok so I’d like to thank the people who helped me figure out how to customize my mod and admin crowns. But now I’ve got another problem, It shows the Admin crown for people with player rights of 2 AND 3. How do I make it so that it only shows up for someone with player rights of 2. And I’d like to know how to add another crown for people with player rights of 3.

U can make custom crowns only for certain people, and you will have to do that server sided bc in bluurrs client the crowns are already configured.

Read full topic
